subject: Football
College Athletics
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: As in a dismal season-opening loss, the Rutgers defense sprung leaks as the game against North Carolina wore on, with Mike Teel throwing three interceptions.
snippet: As in a dismal season-opening loss, the Rutgers defense sprung leaks as the game against North Carolina wore on, with Mike Teel throwing three interceptions.
